description:
Vijeeter Ecor is a member of the Fairy Tail guild.
Vijeeter serves mostly as a back-ground character, and is seen most of the time dancing. However he has been seen in all of the manga`s arcs along with the rest of the guild during there celebrations. He participated in the war against Phantom Lord and had a a fight against Nab Lasaro during the Fighting Festival arc. It is presumed that Nab defeated Vijeeter since he wasn`t among the members who Bixlow took down, but Nab was.
name: Vijeeter Ecor
